name: Persian Quote of the Day by Sokhanak
author: Sajjad Salemi

sections.description: This plugin lets you add a Persian Quote of the Day widget to your WordPress page.
sections.installation:
1. Upload sokhanak.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Appearance, Widgets in WordPress.
  4. Drag the Sokhanak Widget to the sidebar, for example the Main Widget Area or the Secondary Widget Area.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload sokhanak.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Appearance, Widgets in WordPress.
  4. Drag the Sokhanak Widget to the sidebar, for example the Main Widget Area or the Secondary Widget Area.

What versions of WordPress does this work with?

We tested with 4.6.1, 4.4.2, 3.8.1, 3.7.1, and 3.6.1 but it probably works with other versions (3.x or greater).

Let us know in the “Compatibility” poll if it does work with a particular version, and let us know (via the Support tab) if there are any other issues. Thanks!
